info.title: API Documentation
info.description: Documentation of API endpoints for the application

post.description: This endpoint is used for user authentication and returns a Bearer token.
This endpoint is used to create a new user.

get.summary: Get all users or filter by role
get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of users. You can filter users by role using the query parameter 'role'.

patch.description: This endpoint is used to update a user's information.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of active referentiels.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new referentiel.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve referentiels by their state.
This endpoint is used to retrieve competences of a referentiel.
This endpoint is used to retrieve modules of a referentiel.

patch.description: This endpoint is used to update a referentiel's information.

delete.description: This endpoint is used to soft delete a referentiel.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of deleted referentiels.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new promotion.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of all promotions.

patch.description: This endpoint is used to update a promotion's information.
This endpoint is used to update the referentiels of a promotion.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve the current promotion.
This endpoint is used to close a specific promotion by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the promotion to close.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new apprenant and associate them with a referentiel and promotion.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves an apprenant's details by their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apprenant to retrieve.

get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all apprenants in the system.

post.description: This endpoint allows importing multiple apprenants via file upload.

file.description: The file containing apprenant data to import.

post.summary: Ajouter une note de module  un groupe d'apprenants
post.description: Ajoute une note de module  un groupe d'apprenants d'un rfrentiel de la promotion en cours

post.summary: Ajouter des notes de modules  un apprenant
post.description: Ajoute des notes de modules  un apprenant spcifique

patch.summary: Modifier les notes de modules d'un apprenant
patch.description: Modifie les notes de modules d'un apprenant spcifique

get.summary: Lister les notes des apprenants du rfrentiel
get.description: Liste les notes des apprenants du rfrentiel de la promotion en cours

200.description: Liste des notes rcupre avec succs

get.summary: Gnrer le relev de notes des apprenants du rfrentiel
get.description: Gnre le relev de notes des apprenants du rfrentiel de la promotion en cours

get.summary: Gnrer le relev de notes d'un apprenant
get.description: Gnre le relev de notes d'un apprenant spcifique
